title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Honolulu, HI, USA
description:
Hawaii is participating in the Global Day of Coderetreat once again!  Come join us on December 14th for focused practice of your programming skills. 
Please RSVP and send all inquiries through the Aloha.rb meetup page (http://www.meetup.com/aloharb/events/144241112/)   
Location and exact time are still TBD.
